specific_question: What is the average cost of replacing an EV battery in our current fleet, as of Q4 2024?
answer: $120,000 is the average cost of replacing an EV battery in our current fleet, as of Q4 2024.
justification: This answer provides a quantitative understanding of the potential cost savings of improving EV battery lifespan through AI-enhanced battery management, helping to inform the potential business case for implementing this technology.
dr_question: Can we leverage AI-enhanced battery management to improve EV battery lifespan by 15%?
